text: I intended to say "Hallelujah". There is a religious Hallelujah, but there are many other ones. When one looks at the world and his proper life, there's only one thing to say, it's Hallelujah. That's the way it is....
The literal translation is "Pray God". It's not exactly some gratitude but the affirmationÂ there is a will that we can't control. What can we do in front of it ?
A good will or a bad one ?
Saying "Mysterious" is again making a description. This will is obvious from time to time, hidden at other times
